caption: This is a Korean indie rock piece. There is a male vocalist in the lead singing melodically. The main tune is being played by an acoustic guitar with an electric guitar and a bass guitar backing. There is a 4/4 slow tempo acoustic drum beat playing in the rhythmic background. The atmosphere is easygoing. This piece could be used in the soundtrack of a drama movie or TV series that takes place in Korea.
